page.title: 20CONSTANTINE HEALTH CARE
page.content: {HEALTH CENTRE;Constantine}has a new Health centre on the Bowling Green. DR.A.Roberts has established this and money is being raised to buy special equipment by the friends of the surgery.It will save people going long distances for minor health problems. Medicines are also prescribed from the {centre.HOSPITALS;There are two}cottage hospitals near Constantine,one at Falmouth and one at Helston.The main hospital is the Royal Cornwallat Truro HEALTH IN SCHOOL;A docter visits the school at regular intervals toexamine all the new children and any with health problems.The health visitor makes checks ongrowth andcleanliness. {.DENTISTRY;MR.T.Zorab}has recently opened a dental surgery in thevillage .The school children's teeth are all checked regularly by the school dental staff and offered treatment.
